overview:
From the magical Sunny Island Ibiza I salute You! You will find me blogging from my apartment inspired by the full sea-view and magical sunsets! In the mornings I practice Qi-Gong in front of my apartment at the beach or doing my work-outs.

I enjoy financially freedom and my lifestyle is based on totally freedom as well. I am a dedicated life learner and study the universal laws (of attraction).

My hobbies are snorkeling with sharks, formula racing, Sailing across the Mediterranean sea, Kite surfing, playing golf, Travelling and exploring, snowboarding, fitness, Qi-Gong, meditating, Internet, Social Media, Trends, web development.

I will blog ONLY about things that inspires me. http://www.levieneelman.com
